colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS LA MDOS GLUD 'BUL TSUL ZHES PA 'DI NI, BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA'I SKU GZHOGS GRVA TSANG PHAN BDE GSANG SNGAGS GLING GI BSTAN SRING GYI BLO RIG DANG LDAN PA NGEM CHE AER TE NI TZAS SANG BSKAL BZANG DGE LEGS DANG, JANG JONG CHEN PO CHEN WANG GI MNGA' 'BANGS GSO RTZIS KYI BLO RIG PAS BRGYAN PA'I NGE MCHI BLO BZANG NGAG DBANG ZHES BYA BA, GNYIS KA NAN TAN CHEN POS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR KHRAL DU, BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA MTSAN GZHAN BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA'I THA SHAL BA, NYON MONGS KYI BRANG DU GYUR BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON @006B ZHES BGYI BAS SBYAR BA 'DI YAS GNAS SKABS MTHAR THUG GI 'KAL RKIN BAR GCOD KUN SEL ZHING RGYAL BA'I GO 'PHANG 'THOB PA'I RGYU RU BSNGO, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
